The Long of It Flutter’s declarative programming style works extremely well for building a UI and populating it with data, allowing changes in the data state to update the UI state automatically. It’s very easy to tell the framework that, in terms of the UI, you would like something to be different based on the state. However it is less straightforward to tell the framework that you would like something to happen based on the state.
